name: .CAT File Extension
summary: Learn about .CAT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by the Windows operating system; specifies that a group of files are from a verifiable source; used for security purposes and contains a digital signature, the catalog version, and an effective date; often used for verifying new software update files.

content: Windows catalog files help to suppress multiple trust dialog popups for new software component downloads. Since CAT files can identify a trusted source, the user can choose to "Always trust content" from the software distributor. Then, future downloads from the software distributor that use a CAT file are trusted and do not require a trust popup window.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
